casebody.data:
SMITH
v.
YOUNG 223P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Darryl Ray Smith, for Smith, Darryl Ray. Michael W. Young, for Young, Michael W. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of June 2017 by Plaintiff for Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
